name: 放置江湖：隐世门派现武林

editorialNotes.standard: This ingenious take on crossword puzzles challenges you to rearrange a square of letters to create words.  As the game progresses, the grids get bigger, and the difficulty grows with every new solution. With endless possibilities and limited clues to help, it’s a devilishly clever test of logic and vocabulary that you’ll love.
